segments.text: Hi , buddy ! How do you deal with your salary ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I usually put them into my bank account . I think that is a little secure , though the interest rate is low now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Look ! This stock is rising now . I am researching it , and planning to buy some shares .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you invested in the stock market before ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . This is my first time to buy some . You can see that its historical price data is rising now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But that is a little risky , you know .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey ! Do you still remember our teacher of economics , Mr . Locker ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course ! I remember he has a part-time job as a stock analyst .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can ask for some advice from him .
segments.speaker: S1
